name: Hell Awaits
description:
You pour the Cereal into your bowl and a Game Cartridge falls with a clink into your bowl. You pick up the Jet black cartridge and inspect it. Across the Cover in blood red  font it reads "HELL AWAITS". Guess you're skipping breakfast today. 

Made in a few days for E1M1 Jam.

It's janky and rough as hell but it was fun to make.
